message:
Hello all, I see there is a lot of tablets PC in the market.. based on iOS, android and windows.. 
What you think about it?.. there is more suitable and better price tablet PC better than the famous iPad?

My absolutely personal opinion: nothing beats the iPad, for quality of contents and overall user experience. For what i've seen all the others are more or less low quality clones.

There are a lot of rumors about the new Amazon tablet as the real iPad competitor. We will see, i guess.
I don't need a iPad clone. Just a cheaper tablet. Looks like the Amazon tablet will fit that bill nicely
yeah, iPad seems useful for me (medical issue) but too expensive =(
